_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Ree6
author: presti@presti.me
description: All-in-one, open source and 100% free Discord Bot!

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
## this is a simple script to use the github API for release versions.
## this requires the egg has a variable for GITHUB_PACKAGE and VERSION
## this supports using oauth/personal access tokens via GITHUB_USER and GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN (both are required.)
## if you are getting hit with GitHub API limit issues then you need to have the user and token set.
apt update
apt install -y jq curl


CONFIG_LINK="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/bots/discord/ree6/config.yml"
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/Ree6-Applications/Ree6/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/Ree6-Applications/Ree6/releases")
MATCH=jar-with-dependencies.jar


if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i "${MATCH}" | head -1 )
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i "${MATCH}" | head -1)
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i *.jar)
    fi
fi

## Ree6 Setup
[ ! -d /mnt/server ] && mkdir -p /mnt/server

if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
        echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
    else        
        echo -e "link is invalid closing out"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

cd /mnt/server
echo -e "\nInstalling/Updating Ree6...\n"

if [ -f Ree6.jar ]; then
    echo -e "Updating Ree6.jar to latest version..."
    echo -e '\t(Old version can be found at "Ree6.jar-old")'
    mv -f Ree6.jar Ree6.jar-old
fi

echo -e "Running: curl -sSL -o Ree6.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}\n"
curl -sSL -o  Ree6.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}

if [ -f config.yml ]; then
    echo -e "Updating config.yml to latest version..."
    echo -e '\t(Old version can be found at "config.yml-old")'
    mv -f config.yml config.yml-old
fi

echo -e "Running: curl -sSL -o config.yml ${CONFIG_LINK}\n"
curl -sSL -o config.yml ${CONFIG_LINK}
    

echo -e "\nRee6 Successfully Installed!"

variables.name: [REQUIRED] Discord Bot Token
variables.description: The token for your Discord bot. Learn how to obtain a token and configure your bot application properly here: https://jmusicbot.com/getting-a-bot-token/

variables.name: Dagpi token
variables.description: Your Dagpi.xyz API-Token, for tweet image generation!

variables.name: Sentry DSN
variables.description: Your Sentry DSN, for error reporting!

variables.name: Spotify Client Id
variables.description: Spotify Application Configuration, used to parse Spotify Tracks/Playlists to YouTube search queries.

variables.name: Spotify Client Secret
variables.description: Spotify Application Configuration, used to parse Spotify Tracks/Playlists to YouTube search queries.

variables.name: Heartbeat Url
variables.description: The URL to the Heartbeat-Server

variables.name: Heartbeat Interval
variables.description: The interval between the heartbeats.

variables.name: Amari Token
variables.description: Your Amari API-Token, for Amari Level imports!

variables.name: Twitch Client Id
variables.description: Twitch Application Configuration, used for the StreamTools and Twitch Notifications.

variables.name: Twitch Client Secret
variables.description: Twitch Application Configuration, used for the StreamTools and Twitch Notifications.

variables.name: Twitter Bearer Key
variables.description: Twitter Application Configuration, used for the Twitter Notifications.

variables.name: Reddit Client Id
variables.description: Reddit Application Configuration, used for the Reddit Notification.

variables.name: Reddit Client Secret
variables.description: Reddit Application Configuration, used for the Reddit Notification.

variables.name: Instagram Username
variables.description: Instagram Application Configuration, used for the Instagram Notification.

variables.name: Instagram Password
variables.description: Instagram Application Configuration, used for the Instagram Notification.

variables.name: SQL Username
variables.description: Username for the SQL connection.

variables.name: SQL Database
variables.description: Database for the SQL Connection

variables.name: SQL Password
variables.description: Password for the SQL connection.

variables.name: SQL Port
variables.description: Port for the SQL connection.

variables.name: Database Typ
variables.description:
The Typ of the Database Ree6 should use!
Possible typs:
- mariadb
- sqlite
- h2
- postgres

variables.name: Database Storagefile
variables.description: The location of the storagefile if sqlite is being used.

variables.name: [DEVELOPER-STUFF] Database Poolsize
variables.description: The Database connection pool size!

variables.name: Database host
variables.description: The Host address of the Database connection.

variables.name: OpenAI Token
variables.description: Your Authentication token that should be used in the AI API calls.

variables.name: OpenAI Url
variables.description: The URL that should receive the API calls.

variables.name: OpenAI Model
variables.description: The AI model that should be used in the API calls.

variables.name: Activity Status
variables.description: The Activity status of the Bot that will be shown.

variables.name: Feedback Channel
variables.description: The Channel Id of the Feedback channel.

variables.name: [DEVELOPER-STUFF] Bot Owner Id
variables.description: The ID of the Bot Owner, this will be used internally on some checks.

variables.name: Invite Link
variables.description: The Invite link to invite the Bot.

variables.name: Predefined Information for AI
variables.description: The Information for the AI.
variables.default_value: You are Ree6 a Discord bot.

variables.name: Support Link
variables.description: The Url link for users to receive support.

variables.name: Website
variables.description: The Url to the Website of the Bot.

variables.name: Webinterface
variables.description: The Url to the Webinterface.

variables.name: Record Url
variables.description: The Url that uses can access to get their recording.

variables.name: Twitch Url
variables.description: The Url used to connect a Twitch Account with the Ree6 System.

variables.name: Advertisment
variables.description: The Advertisement in Embed Footers and the rest.

variables.name: Name
variables.description: The Name of the Bot.

variables.name: Shards
variables.description: The amount of shards that should be created.
